attributes.action: Immediately freeze MPs' expenses claims until a new transparent accountable system replaces the current one.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Ask the PM to freeze all MP expenses claims immediately - to include all submitted claims pending - until a new transparent system is set up and in place.

No more payments should be made on the discredited system and a full investigation carried out on all claims - made in this Parliament - to see if they met tax rules and claims rules and refunds obtained where warranted.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
